definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:spell2_show_info</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">On</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">Spell2directionNEXT</field></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill @e[tag=LOTW-spell2direction]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute at @e[name=LOTW-spell2waypoint] run particle lotw:dot_purple ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 1 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute at @e[name=LOTW-spell2main] run particle lotw:dot_yellow ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
